Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.SceneControllers

  • Related Packages

    it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI
     
  • Class
    Description
    ChatController
    The ChatController class manages the chat functionality of the GUI.
    ChooseColorController
    The ChooseColorController class handles the color selection interface in the GUI.
    ChooseObjectiveController
    Controller class for the ChooseObjective scene in the GUI.
    ChooseStartingCardSideController
    Controller class for the ChooseStartingCardSide scene in the GUI.
    ClientRenderUpdateThread
    The ClientRenderUpdateThread class is a thread that continuously checks for updates from the shared variable and updates the client's view when notified.
    ClientUpdate
    The ClientUpdate class is a thread that waits for updates from the server.
    CreateGameController
    Controller for the Create Game scene in the GUI.
    DrawCardController
    The DrawCardController class manages the GUI functionality for drawing cards.
    EndGameController
    The EndGameController class manages the end game screen in the GUI.
    ErrorMessageController
    Controller class for displaying error messages in a GUI.
    GameController
    GameController class manages the GUI for the game.
    GameIntroductionController
    This class is the controller for the game introduction scene in the GUI.
    LoginController
    Controller for the login scene in the GUI.
    MainMenuController
    Controller for the main menu scene in the GUI.
    MiniBoardController
    The MiniBoardController class manages the mini boards displayed in the GUI for each opponent.
    ObjectivesController
    The ObjectivesController class manages the display of objectives (both personal and global common objectives) in the GUI.
    ScoreController
    Controller for the Score scene in the GUI.
    ServerConnectionController
    Controller for the server connection scene in the GUI.
    TabController
    Interface for controllers managing tabs in GUI.
    WaitingRoomController
    Controller for the waiting room scene in the GUI.
